CustomField.formula: IF( DATE(YEAR(Plan_Sold_Date__c) + (YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(Plan_Sold_Date__c)), MONTH(Plan_Sold_Date__c), DAY(Plan_Sold_Date__c)) >= TODAY(), DATE(YEAR(Plan_Sold_Date__c) + (YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(Plan_Sold_Date__c)), MONTH( Plan_Sold_Date__c ), DAY(Plan_Sold_Date__c)), DATE(YEAR(Plan_Sold_Date__c) + (YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(Plan_Sold_Date__c)) + 1, MONTH(Plan_Sold_Date__c), DAY(Plan_Sold_Date__c)))
CustomField.label: Plan Anniversary Date
